mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.label AS "label", a.value AS "value", a.dataurl AS "dataUrl", a.table_name AS "tableName", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.description AS "description", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gen_custom_obj( id, label, value, table_name, dataurl, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, description, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{label}, #{value}, #{tableName}, #{dataUrl}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{description}, #{delFlag} )
